description.english: Your commanding officer was killed in action. It's your mission now.
description.german: Dein befehlshabender Offizier wurde im Kampf getötet. Es ist jetzt deine Mission.
description.french: Votre supérieure a été tuée. C'est votre mission désormais.
description.spanish: Vuestro oficial al mando ha muerto en combate. Ahora es vuestra misión.
description.russian: Ваш командир погиб в бою. Теперь судьба задания в ваших руках.
description.polish: Za przejęcie misji na swoje barki po śmierci dowódcy.
description.italian: Il tuo ufficiale in comando è morto in combattimento. Ora tocca a te.
description.brazilian: Seu comandante foi morto em combate. A missão agora é sua.

description.english: You never made it to Colorado Springs.
description.german: Du hast es nie nach Colorado Springs geschafft.
description.french: Vous n'avez jamais atteint Colorado Springs.
description.spanish: No llegasteis a Colorado Springs.
description.russian: Вы так и не добрались до Колорадо-Спрингс.
description.polish: Za to, że nigdy nie udało ci się dotrzeć do Colorado Springs.
description.italian: Non ce l'hai fatta a raggiungere Colorado Springs.
description.brazilian: Você não chegou a Colorado Springs.

description.english: You established a new Ranger HQ in Colorado.
description.german: Du hast ein neues Ranger-HQ in Colorado eingerichtet.
description.french: Vous avez établi un nouveau QG des Rangers au Colorado.
description.spanish: Habéis creado otra sede central de los Rangers en Colorado.
description.russian: Вы основали в Колорадо новый штаб рейнджеров.
description.polish: Za stworzenie nowej kwatery głównej strażników w Kolorado.
description.italian: Hai stabilito un nuovo QG dei Ranger in Colorado.
description.brazilian: Você fundou um novo QG dos Patrulheiros no Colorado.

description.english: You overwrote Valor Buchanan's mind with God-President Reagan.
description.german: Du hast Valor Buchanans Verstand mit Gott-Präsident Reagan überschrieben.
description.french: Vous avez remplacé l'esprit de Valor Buchanan par celui du dieu-président Reagan.
description.spanish: Has sobrescrito la mente de Valor Buchanan con la del Presidente Dios Reagan.
description.russian: Вы перезаписали в мозг Вэлора Бьюкенена разум богопрезидента Рейгана.
description.polish: Za zastąpienie umysłu Valora Buchanana Bogiem-Prezydentem Reaganem.
description.italian: Hai sovrascritto la mente di Valor Buchanan con quella del Presidente-Dio Reagan.
description.brazilian: Você substituiu a mente do Valor Buchanan pela do Presideus Reagan.

description.english: You arrested Valor Buchanan.
description.german: Du hast Valor Buchanan verhaftet.
description.french: Vous avez arrêté Valor Buchanan.
description.spanish: Habéis arrestado a Valor Buchanan
description.russian: Вы арестовали Вэлора Бьюкенена.
description.polish: Za zaaresztowanie Valora Buchanana.
description.italian: Hai arrestato Valor Buchanan.
description.brazilian: Você prendeu o Valor Buchanan.

description.english: You killed Valor Buchanan.
description.german: Du hast Valor Buchanan getötet.
description.french: Vous avez tué Valor Buchanan.
description.spanish: Habéis matado a Valor Buchanan
description.russian: Вы убили Вэлора Бьюкенена.
description.polish: Za zabicie Valora Buchanana.
description.italian: Hai ucciso Valor Buchanan.
description.brazilian: Você matou o Valor Buchanan.

description.english: You killed Victory Buchanan.
description.german: Du hast Victory Buchanan getötet.
description.french: Vous avez tué Victory Buchanan.
description.spanish: Habéis matado a Victory Buchanan.
description.russian: Вы убили Виктори Бьюкенена.
description.polish: Za zabicie Victory'ego Buchanana.
description.italian: Hai ucciso Victory Buchanan.
description.brazilian: Você matou o Victory Buchanan.

description.english: You arrested Victory Buchanan.
description.german: Du hast Victory Buchanan verhaftet.
description.french: Vous avez arrêté Victory Buchanan.
description.spanish: Habéis arrestado a Victory Buchanan.
description.russian: Вы арестовали Виктори Бьюкенена.
description.polish: Za zaaresztowanie Victory'ego Buchanana.
description.italian: Hai arrestato Victory Buchanan.
description.brazilian: Você prendeu o Victory Buchanan.

description.english: You killed Liberty Buchanan.
description.german: Du hast Liberty Buchanan getötet.
description.french: Vous avez tué Liberty Buchanan.
description.spanish: Habéis matado a Liberty Buchanan
description.russian: Вы убили Либерти Бьюкенен.
description.polish: Za zabicie Liberty Buchanan.
description.italian: Hai ucciso Liberty Buchanan.
description.brazilian: Você matou a Liberty Buchanan.

description.english: You arrested Liberty Buchanan.
description.german: Du hast Liberty Buchanan verhaftet.
description.french: Vous avez arrêté Liberty Buchanan.
description.spanish: Habéis arrestado a Liberty Buchanan
description.russian: Вы арестовали Либерти Бьюкенен.
description.polish: Za zaaresztowanie Liberty Buchanan.
description.italian: Hai arrestato Liberty Buchanan.
description.brazilian: Você prendeu a Liberty Buchanan.

description.english: You deposed the Patriarch and liberated Colorado from his rule.
description.german: Du hast den Patriarchen entthront und Colorado von seiner Herrschaft befreit.
description.french: Vous avez destitué le Patriarche et libéré le Colorado de son emprise.
description.spanish: Habéis destituido al Patriarca y liberado a Colorado de su yugo.
description.russian: Вы сместили Патриарха и освободили Колорадо из-под его власти.
description.polish: Za pozbycie się Patriarchy i uwolnienie Kolorado spod jego rządów.
description.italian: Hai destituito il Patriarca e liberato il Colorado dal suo giogo.
description.brazilian: Você depôs o Patriarca e libertou o Colorado do seu jugo.

description.english: You defeated Angela Deth and stopped a coup.
description.german: Du hast Angela Deth besiegt und einen Putsch verhindert.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu Angela Deth et empêché un coup d'État.
description.spanish: Habéis vencido a Angela Deth y evitado un golpe de estado.
description.russian: Вы победили Анжелу Дет и предотвратили осуществление заговора.
description.polish: Za pokonanie Angeli Deth i powstrzymanie zamach stanu.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Angela Deth e impedito un colpo di stato.
description.brazilian: Você derrotou a Angela Deth e evitou um golpe de estado.

displayName.french: Un très long mois de novembre...

description.english: Team November and the Rangers have taken over Colorado.
description.german: Team November und die Ranger haben Colorado übernommen.
description.french: La Team November et les Rangers se sont emparés du Colorado.
description.spanish: El Equipo Noviembre y los Rangers han tomado Colorado.
description.russian: Группа 'Ноябрь' и рейнджеры подчинили себе Колорадо.
description.polish: Za przejęcie Kolorado przez jednostkę November i strażników.
description.italian: Il Team November e i Ranger hanno preso il controllo del Colorado.
description.brazilian: A equipe November e os Patrulheiros tomaram o Colorado.

description.english: You beat the game on the easiest difficulty.
description.german: Du hast das Spiel mit der einfachsten Schwierigkeit abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu en mode facile.
description.spanish: Has ganado el juego en el nivel más fácil.
description.russian: Вы прошли игру на самом легком уровне сложности.
description.polish: Za pokonanie gry na najłatwiejszym poziomie trudności.
description.italian: Hai terminato il gioco al livello più facile.
description.brazilian: Você venceu o jogo na dificuldade mais fácil.

description.english: You beat the game on the normal difficulty.
description.german: Du hast das Spiel mit normaler Schwierigkeit abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu en mode normale.
description.spanish: Has ganado el juego en el nivel normal.
description.russian: Вы прошли игру на обычном уровне сложности.
description.polish: Za pokonanie gry na normalnym poziomie trudności.
description.italian: Hai terminato il gioco al livello normale.
description.brazilian: Você venceu o jogo na dificuldade normal.

description.english: You beat the game on the hard difficulty.
description.german: Du hast das Spiel mit hoher Schwierigkeit abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu en mode difficile.
description.spanish: Has ganado el juego en el nivel difícil.
description.russian: Вы прошли игру на высоком уровне сложности.
description.polish: Za pokonanie gry na wyższym poziomie trudności.
description.italian: Hai terminato il gioco al livello difficile.
description.brazilian: Você venceu o jogo na dificuldade difícil.

description.english: You beat the game on the hardest difficulty.
description.german: Du hast das Spiel mit dem höchsten Schwierigkeit abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu en mode extrême.
description.spanish: Has ganado el juego en el nivel más difícil.
description.russian: Вы прошли игру на самом высоком уровне сложности.
description.polish: Za pokonanie gry na najwyższym poziomie trudności.
description.italian: Hai terminato il gioco al livello più difficile.
description.brazilian: Você venceu o jogo na dificuldade mais difícil.

description.english: You found the Kodiak.
description.german: Du hast den Kodiak gefunden.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé le Kodiak.
description.spanish: Habéis encontrado el Kodiak.
description.russian: Вы нашли 'Кадьяк'.
description.polish: Za znalezienie Kodiaka.
description.italian: Hai trovato il Kodiak.
description.brazilian: Você encontrou o Kodiak.

description.english: You answered Morningstar's call and gave him a new home.
description.german: Du hast den Anruf von Morningstar angenommen und ihm ein neues Zuhause gegeben.
description.french: Vous avez répondu à l'appel de Fléau et l'avez recruté.
description.spanish: Has respondido a la llamada de Lucero del alba y le has dado un nuevo hogar.
description.russian: Вы отозвались на сигнал Моргенштерна и дали ему новый дом.
description.polish: Za odzew na zew Jutrzenki i znalezienie dla niego nowego domu.
description.italian: Hai risposto alla chiamata di Morningstar e gli hai dato una nuova casa.
description.brazilian: Você respondeu ao chamado do Morningstar e deu-lhe um novo lar.

description.english: You set off Morningstar's self-destruct mechanism.
description.german: Du hast den Selbstzerstörungsmechanismus von Morningstar ausgelöst.
description.french: Vous avez enclenché le mécanisme d'auto-destruction de Fléau.
description.spanish: Has activado el mecanismo de autodestrucción de Lucero del alba.
description.russian: Вы отключили механизм самоуничтожения Моргенштерна.
description.polish: Za uruchomienie mechanizmu autodestrukcji Jutrzenki.
description.italian: Hai attivato il meccanismo di autodistruzione di Morningstar.
description.brazilian: Você acionou o mecanismo de autodestruição do Morningstar.

description.english: You dealt with Erastus Dorsey before he could harm the Hoon family.
description.german: Du hast dich um Erastus Dorsey gekümmert, bevor er der Familie Hoon Schaden zufügen konnte.
description.french: Vous avez réglé son compte à Erastus Dorsey avant qu'il ne fasse du mal à la famille Hoon.
description.spanish: Haces un trato con Erastus Dorsey antes de que pueda hacer daño a la familia Hoon.
description.russian: Вы не дали Эрасту Дорси причинить вред семейству Хунов.
description.polish: Za zajęcie się Erastusem Dorseyem, zanim mógł zaszkodzić rodzinie Hoonów.
description.italian: Hai affrontato Erastus Dorsey prima che potesse fare del male alla famiglia Hoon.
description.brazilian: Você lidou com o Erastus Dorsey antes que ele fizesse mal à família Hoon.

description.english: You saved the shipment of power armor from the Scar Collectors.
description.german: Du hast die Lieferung der Powerpanzerung vor den Narbensammlern gerettet.
description.french: Vous avez empêché que l'armure assistée soit volée par les Collectionneurs de cicatrices.
description.spanish: Has salvado el cargamento de servoarmaduras de los Cicatrizados.
description.russian: Вы спасли партию силовой брони от собирателей шрамов.
description.polish: Za uratowanie transportu pancerzy wspomaganych z rąk Szramolicych.
description.italian: Hai salvato la spedizione di armature potenziate dai Collezionisti di Cicatrici.
description.brazilian: Você salvou o carregamento de armaduras mecanizadas dos Coleta-cicatrizes.

displayName.french: Pas le temps de se laisser distraire
displayName.italian: Non c'è tempo per le distrazioni

description.english: You allowed the Hoons to be murdered and the power armor to be stolen.
description.german: Du hast zugelassen, dass die Hoons ermordet und die Powerpanzerung gestohlen wurde.
description.french: Vous avez laissé les Hoon se faire tuer et l'armure assistée être volée.
description.spanish: Has permitido que asesinen a los Hoon y que roben la servoarmadura.
description.russian: Вы не помешали ни убийце семьи Хунов, ни похитителям силовой брони.
description.polish: Za pozwolenie na zamordowanie Hoonów i kradzież pancerzy wspomaganych.
description.italian: Hai permesso l'uccisione degli Hoon e che l'armatura potenziata venisse rubata.
description.brazilian: Você deixou que assassinassem os Hoons e roubassem a armadura mecanizada.

description.english: Darius Kwon has offered to join your party.
description.german: Darius Kwon möchte eurer Gruppe beitreten.
description.french: Darius Kwon a proposé de rejoindre votre groupe.
description.spanish: Darius Kwon se ha ofrecido a unirse a vuestro grupo.
description.russian: Дарий Квон предложил свои услуги вашей группе.
description.polish: Darius Kwon chce dołączyć do waszej drużyny.
description.italian: Darius Kwon si è offerto di unirsi al tuo gruppo.
description.brazilian: Darius Kwon se ofereceu para se juntar ao seu grupo.

description.english: Lucia Wesson has offered to join your party.
description.german: Lucia Wesson möchte eurer Gruppe beitreten.
description.french: Lucia Wesson a proposé de rejoindre votre groupe.
description.spanish: Lucía Wesson se ha ofrecido a unirse a vuestro grupo.
description.russian: Лусия Вессон предложила свои услуги вашей группе.
description.polish: Lucia Wesson chce dołączyć do waszej drużyny.
description.italian: Lucia Wesson si è offerta di unirsi al tuo gruppo.
description.brazilian: Lucia Wesson se ofereceu para se juntar ao seu grupo.

description.english: Ironclad Cordite has offered to join your party.
description.german: Ironclad Cordite möchte eurer Gruppe beitreten.
description.french: Cordite le Cuirassé a proposé de rejoindre votre groupe.
description.spanish: Explosivo Acorazado se ha ofrecido a unirse a vuestro grupo.
description.russian: Кордит Броненосец предложил свои услуги вашей группе.
description.polish: Pancerny Cordite chce dołączyć do waszej drużyny.
description.italian: Ironclad Cordite si è offerta di unirsi al tuo gruppo.
description.brazilian: Ironclad Cordite se ofereceu para se juntar ao seu grupo.

description.german: Victory Buchanan möchte eurer Gruppe beitreten.
description.french: Victory Buchanan a proposé de rejoindre votre groupe.
description.spanish: Victory Buchanan se ha ofrecido a unirse a vuestro grupo.
description.russian: Виктори Бьюкенен предложил свои услуги вашей группе.
description.polish: Victory Buchanan chce dołączyć do waszej drużyny.
description.italian: Victory Buchanan si è offerta di unirsi al tuo gruppo.
description.brazilian: Victory Buchanan se ofereceu para se juntar ao seu grupo.

description.french: Pizepi Joren a proposé de rejoindre votre groupe.
description.spanish: Pizepi Joren se ha ofrecido a unirse a vuestro grupo.
description.russian: Пизепи Джорен предложила свои услуги вашей группе.
description.polish: Pizepi Joren chce dołączyć do waszej drużyny.
description.italian: Pizepi Joren si è offerta di unirsi al tuo gruppo.
description.brazilian: Pizepi Joren se ofereceu para se juntar ao seu grupo.

description.english: Scotchmo has offered to join your party.
description.german: Scotchmo möchte eurer Gruppe beitreten.
description.french: Scotchmo a proposé de rejoindre votre groupe.
description.spanish: Scotchmo se ha ofrecido a unirse a vuestro grupo.
description.russian: Скотчмо предложил свои услуги вашей группе.
description.polish: Scotchmo chce dołączyć do waszej drużyny.
description.italian: Scotchmo si è offerto di unirsi al tuo gruppo.
description.brazilian: Scotchmo se ofereceu para se juntar ao seu grupo.
